urls.title: Travel requirements | LATAM Airlines
urls.description: Know the restrictions to travel inside and outside of Chile.

data.text: @ausoboal Hi, each country has different travel restrictions. You can find more about them entering your origin and destination, here: https://t.co/gN5wKAv39J. Regards.

@SConde Hi, sometimes our website's performance can be affected by browser’s history. We suggest for you to delete the history and/or the cookies on your device, or you can try using a different browser. If the error persists, send us a screenshot, to evaluate the best way to assist you.
@lolilando Hola, puedes escribirnos tus consultas al DM. Saludos.

@losmanguitar In this case, we'd recommend the TOP fare as it's the most flexible and allows changes or refunds without penalty. Also, remember that the ticket conditions can be found in your unique sales receipt. If you want us to check this further, please write us by DM.

urls.title: More flexibility to travel | LATAM Airlines
urls.description: Check out the flexible purchase options we have for your next trip.

data.text: @losmanguitar Hi, we ask you to please verify the flexibility and ticket conditions on our new digital experience: https://t.co/oIfPouDSX3 since this information is not updated on the old website. If you have any other questions, do not hesitate to contact us. Regards.

urls.title: Self-service and Contact Center | LATAM Airlines
urls.description: Here you will find the answer to the most frequent questions. You can communicate with us on our WhatsApp number or call us if you still have any questions and we will do our best to help you.

data.text: @FernandaVDias1 Fernanda, please get in contact our Contact center to be transferred with the area in charge. Into this link you can find our phone numbers by country: https://t.co/gDD8PVUkPQ Regards.

urls.title: Requisitos para viajar | LATAM Airlines
urls.description: Conoce las restricciones para viajar dentro y fuera de Estados Unidos.

data.text: @bomitoni Hola, se aceptará el desembarco en el aeropuerto de pasajeros extranjeros que conecten con otros países (escalas). Los pasajeros deben permanecer en la zona de conexión y no se les permitirá ingresar al territorio nacional, esta y más requisitos https://t.co/4oYWvgRJ8j. Saludos.
@FernandaVDias1 Hello Fernanda, apologies for the delayed response. Please let us know in which one language you prefer to be assisted Portuguese or English. Regards.
@downtownnyc74 Hi, in order to assist you, please send us by DM the reservation code (6 letters) or the ticket number (13 digits) and the full name of the passenger. We look forward to your response.
@MadeOfFluff Hello Grant, tell us please by DM your requirement. We'll stay tuned.
@MaisaFaith Hello Maisa, please tell us how can we help you by DM. We'll stay tuned.

@lisbeth_marian Hello, in order to assist you with your request, please provide us via DM with the reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 digits) and the passenger's full name. We will be waiting for your reply

As this year ends, we have thousands of reasons to be with the people we love ❤🎄.  Because gathering, hugging, laughing, and sharing special moments are the gifts that make us fly 🛫✨. https://t.co/Quav81rBMi

@SchioppaLorena Hi, bear in mind that due to the high demand, response times are being longer. In the meantime, we ask you to please verify your luggage status on this link: https://t.co/oR4VEC2XQl. Regards.

data.text: @bentoriffic Hi, in order to look into this, please send us a DM letting us know whether you've created a claim about this and provide us with its number, or let us know your reservation code and the full name of the passenger. https://t.co/Hp7JCSCLdS
@CinthyaJLOPEZ1 Hi, we have sent you a response via DM. Regards.

@ivedt921 Hola, una de nuestras principales preocupaciones es el estricto cumplimiento de los itinerarios, no obstante, no estamos exentos a que los itinerarios se vean afectados, si lo deseas puedes formular tu reclamación a través del siguiente enlace: https://t.co/YcpNbqrgQ2 Saludos.
@ivedt921 Hola, tus comentarios son muy importantes para nosotros, puedes generar tu reclamo a través del siguiente enlace: https://t.co/qjqe3M48Yr. Quedamos atentos. Saludos.

@SalomeHNYC Te hemos enviado una respuesta vía DM. Saludos.
@martinezmariajo Hola, queremos ofrecerte sinceras disculpas por las molestias causadas. Comentanos vía DM si tienes algún requerimiento en el que te podamos asistir. Quedamos atentos. Saludos.

@davidflys2much Hi, we encourage you to submit your concerns about your experience with our Customer Care Team in the following link: https://t.co/2bX9sCT02z, and in this way we can take the corresponding actions that allow us to improve our service. Regards.
@Risa723 We have sent you a private message. Regards.
@HeathrowAirport ✈️ 💙 ❤️

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]

data.text: @thekrzi Hi, we have sent you a private message. Regards.
@FelipeVillacis Te hemos enviado un DM. Saludos.
@CarlaStechina Hola, para asistirte envíanos vía DM tu código de reserva (6 letras) y/o número de ticket (13 dígitos) y el nombre completo de un pasajero. Quedamos atentos.
@david_zukerman Hola, por favor indícanos de qué manera podemos ayudarte. Estaremos pendientes de tu respuesta.
@DanieleIzidoro2 Hi, please send us via DM your original booking reference and full name of the passenger to carry out the respective validations. We will stay tuned for your information. Regards.
@BG420BG Brian, we have sent you a DM. Regards.

@MissCupece Thank you for your comments, at the moment we can't make payments of baggage by this means, only at the airport. Furthermore, purchase of seats must be done with the customer service, unless the flight is in the next 48 hours, this is due to the high amount of cases. Regards.
@MissCupece Please send us the reservation code and passengers full name by DM. We'll stay tuned.
@MissCupece If web page doesn't work we ask you to please make the purchase directly at the airport. Best regards.

@MissCupece Hi, sometimes the web page can be affected by browser history or the cookies, for this reason we ask you to delete them and try to make the purchase one more time or try to use a different browser or device (preferably a computer). Regards.
@Risa723 Hello, please tell us more details about your inquire by DM. We'll stay tuned,

annotations.normalized_text: Global Traveler GT Tested Reader Survey Awards

data.text:
Let’s celebrate together the Four Star Global Airline 2022 qualification in the Official Airline Ratings, awarded by @theAPEXassoc, and the recognition as the “Best Airline in South America” given by the Global Traveler GT Tested Reader Survey Awards.
https://t.co/OCJl1nApMF https://t.co/7qRF0i3nxB
@VictorViviescas Hola, para poder ayudarte mediante DM indícanos tu código de reserva, número de orden o número de ticket, y el nombre completo de un pasajero. Quedamos atentos a tu respuesta.
@USFunds Providing our Solidarity Plane for the transportation of the COVID-19 vaccine in South America, makes us fly. ✈️ ❤️ 💙
